description.narrative: At least 770,000 new users (550,000 rural, 220,000 small towns), prioritising vulnerable groups, have access to and use safe water and 480,000 people (350,000 rural and 130,000 small towns) have access to and use safe sanitation and improved hygiene practices..

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
